Sky Knight laughed at Blazer. He turned his head to Techy, who glared 
at him instantly, and asked, "Let him out now?"

Sky Knight was still grinning. "Sure." He turned his head back to 
Blazer. Techy stepped to the side and pressed a button on the cell. 
The door of it slid open. Beserk turned his head, looking at the 
scientists. He finally decided and walked out. He passed a glance at 
the three. Techy pushed her hands up against him just in case he 
snapped.

"Go on," she said. "All done."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Blazer looks at Techy, a bit alarmed.
> 
> "Um..." he says, looking back at the remains of the drones, "I 
think they're 
> fine there, I mean he might need some toys, I mean we can take them 
out when 
> he goes out of there or something, right?"
> 
> Blazer might have been a good scientist, but he was a bad fighter, 
and 
> avoided battle as much as possible. Going in there with Berserk 
might turn 
> out to be trouble.
